name: Linux Firefox Text Field Correction
description: This is a very short correction for input fields in Firefox 48 on Linux Kernel 4.6.4 where the text fields (like usernames, passwords, and dropdown menus) appear as white text on white backgrounds for Linux dark themes.
additional_info:
Firefox 48
Linux 4.6.4

The code consists of only two lines, editing the CSS would allow anyone to change the color from midtone gray (#808080 - default) to anything they wish.
